forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
